row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_HOST# = &AGENT# :SET &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_LOGIN# = &LOGIN# :SET &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_DIR#, '/*')
:SET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_HOST# = &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT# :SET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_LOGIN# = &UC4RB_TARGET_LOGIN# :SET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TARGET_DIR#, '/*')
:SET &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_HOST#) :SET &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_HOST#)
! Handle Source-Path :PRINT "Source-Path before convert: &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES#" ! WINDOWS :IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.REMOVE_TRAILING_LINE_BREAK : SET &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ENDIF
!UNIX :IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.REMOVE_TRAILING_LINE_BREAK : SET &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ENDIF :PRINT "Source-Path after convert: &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES#"
! Handle Target-Path :PRINT "Target before convert: &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES#" ! WINDOWS :IF &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.REMOVE_TRAILING_LINE_BREAK : SET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ENDIF
! UNIX :IF &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.REMOVE_TRAILING_LINE_BREAK : SET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ENDIF :PRINT "Target after convert: &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES#"
:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_HOST = "&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_HOST#" :PUT_ATT FT_SRC_LOGIN = "&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_LOGIN#" :PUT_ATT FT_SRC_FILE = "&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES#"
:PUT_ATT FT_DST_HOST = "&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_HOST#" :PUT_ATT FT_DST_LOGIN = "&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_LOGIN#" :PUT_ATT FT_DST_FILE = "&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES#"
